thing-type.label: Test Thing
thing-type.description: Sample Test thing for MyKitaHeatPump Binding

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: Id
parameter.description: Slave id. Also known as station address or unit identifier.

parameter.name: enableDiscovery
parameter.label: Discovery enabled
parameter.description: When enabled we try to find a device specific handler. Turn this on if you're using one of the supported devices.

parameter.name: timeBetweenTransactionsMillis
parameter.label: Time between transactions (ms)
parameter.description: How long to delay we must have at minimum between two consecutive MODBUS transactions. In milliseconds.

parameter.name: timeBetweenReconnectMillis
parameter.label: Time between reconnections (ms)
parameter.description: How long to wait to before trying to establish a new connection after the previous one has been disconnected. In milliseconds.

parameter.name: connectMaxTries
parameter.label: Maximum connection tries
parameter.description: How many times we try to establish the connection. Should be at least 1.

parameter.name: reconnectAfterMillis
parameter.label: Disconnect and establish the connection again after this time (ms)
parameter.description: The connection is kept open at least the time specified here. Value of zero means that connection is disconnected after every MODBUS transaction. In milliseconds.

parameter.name: connectTimeoutMillis
parameter.label: Timeout for establishing the connection (ms)
parameter.description: The maximum time that is waited when establishing the connection. Value of zero means that system/OS default is respected. In milliseconds.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Poll interval (ms)
parameter.description: Poll interval in milliseconds. Use zero to disable automatic polling.

parameter.name: maxTries
parameter.label: Maximum tries when reading
parameter.description: Number of tries when reading data, if some of the reading fail. For single try, enter 1.

parameter.name: cacheMillis
parameter.label: Cache duration (ms)
parameter.description:
Duration for data cache to be valid, in milliseconds. This cache is used only to serve REFRESH commands.

Use zero to disable the caching.

parameter.name: updateUnchangedValuesEveryMillis
parameter.label: Interval for updating unchanged values (ms)
parameter.description: Interval to update unchanged values. Normally unchanged values are not updated. In milliseconds.
